name: Quack n Smack
description:
This is my entry for the "I can't draw but want to make a game (again)" jam 2020!

It's only a short demo.

You are a Mother Duck and you must navigate your babies through a dangerous forest. But don't worry! This mama packs one heck of a kick. Smack up your enemies with your kick attack!

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Smack

X - Quack (Call/Stop babies)

P - Pause

Thank you for playing!
